howItWorksSubtitle: A simple, three-step process to get you the help you need.
step1Description: Use our Smart Triage tool to tell us how you're feeling. You can also upload images for a more accurate analysis.
step2Description: Our intelligent system analyzes your information and provides a preliminary triage recommendation and suggests relevant specialists.
step3Description: Based on the recommendation, book an appointment, read health tips, or manage your health data all in one place.
